entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, trying to find an object that Gregorovitch had owned.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: A person who once owned an object that Voldemort is searching for.

entities.name: the ministry of magic
entities.description: The governing body of the wizarding world.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is thinking about the thief.

entities.name: the unknown thief
entities.description: A person who stole an object from Gregorovitch.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Two wizards who are mentioned as having a similar air of triumphant trickery.

relationships.description: Voldemort is searching for an object that Gregorovitch once owned.
The unknown thief is the target of Voldemort's search.
